text: This week's #COVID19 data has been released @MassDPH @MassGovernor & although down slightly👍🏾it looks like we have a 3-week plateau so let's keep the #MaskUp #Distancing #Handwashing & get the #vaccine asap so we can get the rates down even more while we #REOPENSCHOOLS #mapoli 😷 https://t.co/q8kntMdqYd
